        Parameters:

      • moveEnemies

        public void moveEnemies()
        Moves the enemies to a new location, checks for collisions and handles in-game death and or victory as well, based on either zero health or zero time, respectively. Also, if the enemy has moved outside the frame or if it collided with the player, it is replaced by a new enemy instance

      • hasWon

        public void hasWon()
        Handles the case that the GameTimer has reached zero, and changes the screen to the next unless it was the last level, in which case it changes the screen to the main menu

        public double calculateMaxScaling(int newWidth,
